name: After Death (itch) (Simonxc2)
description:
This is our final project it's not so perfect but we are very proudly present it.

After Death : it's the 3D atmospheric horror side-scroller relevant to Thai beliefs about life and death.

Which is has immersive gameplay included puzzles solving that along with story-lines to reach the game's destination.

Story : In the deep dark forest one boy woke up with vanished memory he doesn't even regconize himself and the reason why he's currently here for seeking the truth he has continue his journey to seeking the truth and find the way to get out of this nightmare.

Enjoy!

Artbook AfterDeath

http://online.anyflip.com/sasbb/cjab/mobile/index.html
